Interactions: You must be the pizza delivery boy they sent.
Oh yes indeed, I am the scientist that called upon your establishment!
Please do make yourself comfortable as I make arrangements of pay for you.
Enter through any of my doors.
I'm, uh... fixing them at the moment...
Now where did I put my funds?
Aw, man, looks like you went and looked into the door.
Well, I guess you're kinda stuck in there.
But I want that pizza, so let's find out how to get you out!
